idea:
We are in development of a web and app based platform for businesses and individuals. This platform will be dual platform for users where they can register as individual or as a business. This will be a chat based marketplace for businesses however businesses will also be able to on-board their employees for intra-organisation communication and also can use this platform as a communication medium for vendors and customers. This platform can be used for setting meetings and tasks, submitting bills, sending purchase requests with workflow(approvals).

The app will be also equipped with AI assistants for meeting and task management, for buy and sales assistants.
name: VEGENTO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Gaurav Gada & Associates

idea:
My startup is to build a power-bank vending machine and mobile app for the same. With the help of app, user can scan the machine and take a powerbank bank at per hour rate. Use and then simply return to either same or any other nearby machine (For e.g. take powerbank at station 1, use it during the train journey and return on arrival station).

With the increasing digitization and technology, everyone uses mobile phone for better connectivity, self security and to avoid boredom. Powerbank at the same time makes it very convenient for us to stay charged even when we are travelling or not having the socket charging option. But not all can own a powerbank, also not all remembers to carry it and so the problem of phone discharging is still there which not only an inconvenience but also can be highly unsafe when you're travelling alone and in case of emergency has no option to connect with your safe ones.  
I've started to develop the prototype. and need support to implement this with best technology which I've learnt during my education at Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay and install vending powerbank devices at multiple places so that a user can take it, charge the phone and drop at another nearby vending station.
name: Vicinity Charter
